EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - What's New in 8.3 Service Pack 1 - EMEA/US - 2015.02.17.Email - Follow
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Attending our Webinar - What's New in 8.3 Service Pack 1
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: What’s New in 8.3 Service Pack 1
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Thank you for attending our ‘What’s New’ Webinar, introducing all the new features from the 8.3 Service Pack 1 Release. We hope you enjoyed the webinar and are excited as we are to try out our new features. Thank you for your active participation and engaging questions which helped to make the webinar lively and interesting. If you would like to stay up to date with current Tricentis news, please follow us on Twitter @Tricentis <https://twitter.com/Tricentis>.
Learn more about our new features and solutions through our What’s New Videos, available here <http://www.tricentis.com/products/what-is-new/>.
Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
Gerd Weishaar VP Product Management Tricentis
Roman Zednik Director Presales Worldwide Tricentis
